name: Bolt of Glory
text:
You fire a ray of positive energy. A creature struck takes varying damage, depending on its nature and home plane of existence.

  • Neutral outsiders and creatures native to the Material Plane and Elemental Planes take 1d6 points of damage per 2 levels (maximum 7d6).
  • Evil outsiders, undead, and natives of the Negative Energy Plane take 1d6 points of damage per level (maximum 15d6).
  • All other creatures take no damage.
text_zh: 你射出了一到正能量射线。被击中的生物会受到多种伤害，这取决于它的本质以及生存的母位面。中立的异界生物以及主物质位面和元素位面的本土生物，会受到1d6点/2等级(最多7d6)的伤害。邪恶异界生物、不死生物以及负能量位面的本土生物会受到1d6点/等级(最多15d6)的伤害。其他生物不会受到伤害。
